attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government keeps telling us that we should be more eco friendly....hybrid and 'green' cars, wind turbines and solar panels are currently out of the range of the average British family especially in the current economic climate.  We request that VAT is abolished on the purchase of Hybrid cars, wind turbines and solar panels.  The government can show us that they really do want to make a difference to the environment by supporting this.
